sentences.en: And underneath her fear those implacable insects were still martyrizing her.
sentences.cn: 在她的痛苦下面,那些难和解的虫子仍然在折磨她.

sentences.en: Art and science are not implacable, but can excavate to have great potentialities.
sentences.cn: 艺术与科学并非不可调和, 而是大有潜力可挖掘.

sentences.en: He displayed himself steadfastly resolved to propitiate and favour that implacable city.
sentences.cn: 他表示决心同这个结下深仇的城市和解,并予以照顾.

sentences.en: He knew that Karl could be an implacable foe.
sentences.cn: 他明白卡尔可能会成为他的死敌.

sentences.en: In the face of the implacable evil witnessed this week, the answer may have changed.
sentences.cn: 面对本周这一令人无法容忍的罪行, 答案也许已经改变了.

sentences.en: Is it a scared refusal to see Islamist terrorism for the implacable, irrational enemy it is?
sentences.cn: 但那些人为何有如此反应,作者的解释并不圆满.

sentences.en: It all happens with the implacable symmetry and merciless banality of life.
sentences.cn: 一切的发生都伴随着生活那无法改变的匀称和残忍的平庸.

sentences.en: Oh , heavens -- you are, then , some secret , implacable , and mortal enemy!
sentences.cn: 你就是那个躲在幕后与我不共戴天的死对头!

sentences.en: Sacrifice, patience, understanding and implacable purpose may be our lots for years to come.
sentences.cn: 接下来的几年,我们需要牺牲 、 耐心 、 理解和不达目的誓不罢休的决心.

sentences.en: The move has won the implacable opposition of many economists.
sentences.cn: 该提案遭到了许多经济学家的坚决反对。

sentences.en: The others, drawing a second's breath, closed in again , implacable, unconquerable, ferocious.
sentences.cn: 其他的人透一口气, 又一次围拢来, 毫不留情, 势不可当, 狰狞残忍.

sentences.en: The young man's implacable eyes interrogated Villefort , who, on his side , glanced from Noirtier to d'Avrigny.
sentences.cn: 那年轻人用仇深似海的眼睛看着维尔福, 维尔福则把求助的眼光从诺瓦梯埃转到阿夫里尼.

sentences.en: There is implacable hatred between the two nations.
sentences.cn: 两国之间有无法消除的仇恨.
他们是势不两立的竞争对手.

words.tran_cn: 不能安抚的；难和解的；不能缓和的

trans.tran_cn: （指愤怒、仇恨、敌意等）难和解的，难平息的，仇恨深的，不能改变的
